page.title: 16THE ARTS
page.content: { Aviemore Players,}the present local amateur dramatic club was formed in 1976 and has a membership of 15.The club's activities revolve around 3 main performances 1)staging Xmas pantomime 2)entering plays in local community drama festival 3)local productions.The choice of material for shows is limited by the fact that the Players are a small group consisting mainly of women.Costumes and props are made by the cast while scenery and back-stage work is done by local helpers. {Strathspey Royal British Legion Pipe {Band}meet for weekly practice sessions in Aviemore.There are 8 adults and 9 children in the band.They raise money to cover travel,equipment and clothing costs by performing throughout the valley.The junior section is coached by senior band members.
